Text: Just burned this off - Rage meets Dragonforce - 'scuse the the language - fucking amazing!!!! Thankyou : )
Dude, jesus christ, these guys are amazing...I wish my band sounded like this...
I consider "the crimson king" album a much greater effort, the debut is a somewhat predictable album, I expected more creative outlets from this perfect colaboration.

Im stuck at 99,2%  and been all day....wtf.

SEED !!!!!

This is just awesome, I have always liked Blind Guardian and Iced Earth and for them to make a co-op band like demons&wizards is a dream come true...
D&W song "Tear Down the Wall" is one of the greatest metal songs I've ever heard, I even bought the original CD...
Thank you, for this great upload, Chernokril
